urls.title: AITX
urls.description: The Official YouTube Page for AITX. AITX’s wholly owned subsidiaries have created the new Autonomous Remote Services industry using custom designed robotics and artificial intelligence-based technology. These solutions empower organizations to improve efficiencies in high frequency workflow tasks, deploy needed technology in areas previously impossible, solve complex challenges, and do it all at costs significantly lower than legacy solutions.

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Automotive, Aircraft & Boat Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Financial Services Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to Banks, Credit cards, Insurance, Investments, Stocks

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Technology Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to softwares, apps, communication equipments, hardwares

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

data.text: $AITX Shout out to @Delta the new fast wifi is awesome... Now our followers/fans/investors can catch up on company news we share via YouTube! https://t.co/TRYMcogzyh
